content.raw: I look into it a little. In *CameraSensor classes, `Sensor::Fini` is now called after the camera is removed - this then removes the ogre viewport and the attached compositor instances which causes the above listener to be an invalid pointer.  So I think it's fine to remove this bit of code since ogre takes care of the destruction of these objects for us.
